name: No.16
storyBehind: The bold fragrance of peach and pineapple, with a subtle kaoliang aroma on the exhale, perfect for those who want to try kaoliang but are concerned about its strong flavor.

name: Gentleman
storyBehind: Kaoliang as the base, with a slight sweet and sour note, pure and clear flavor. Ideal for those who enjoy a clear experience of kaoliang flavor.

name: Rouge of Yanan
storyBehind: Smooth and balanced, with a slightly sweet bitterness. Ideal for those who usually enjoy strong spirits.

name: Wendy's Ex
flavorProfile: Earl Grey Vodka / Plum / Tonic Water
storyBehind: A blend of Earl Grey tea and honey plum, with a light, refreshing tonic water fizz.

name: Perfume
storyBehind: Bourbon base, sweet and sour blueberry flavor, garnished with fresh mint leaves.

name: Sigur Eyes
storyBehind: A special drink made by my good friend Yunhan, with the sweet and sour taste of peach and pineapple, so popular it was named after the guest.

name: Bloom Brush
storyBehind: A smooth fruit blend made by shaking the ingredients vigorously, creating a creamy sweet and sour drink.

name: Bubbles
storyBehind: A sweet and sour sparkling fruit vinegar drink, perfect for refreshing or helping with hangovers.

name: Sober Diablo
storyBehind: Made with de-alcoholized wines, offering the flavor of alcohol in a non-alcoholic drink.
